title: bindings
description: approv binding to a programming language

activity-mappings.description: associates events encountered during program execution with activities

activity.description: a reference to an activity type defined in approv

group.description: bindings can be grouped, for instance bindings related to database access can be placed into one group

executions.description: this defines program executions to be mapped

call.description: the execution of a function -- for virtual function, this is the virtual function

owner.description: the artifact defining the function, such as the fully classified name of a class declaring a method

signature.description: the signature or descriptor of the function

entityRef.description: the entity reference at a call site, this, return or arg

entityRefIndex.description: the index of an argument, only to be used if the value of entityRef is arg, otherwise should be set to -1. argument indexing starts with 0.

entity-mappings.description: associates data encountered during program execution with entities

entity.description: a reference to an entity type defined in approv

group.description: bindings can be grouped, for instance bindings related to database access can be placed into one group

executions.description: this defines the datapoint at executions to be mapped

call.description: the execution of a function -- for virtual function, this is the virtual function

owner.description: the artifact defining the function, such as the fully classified name of a class declaring a method

signature.description: the signature or descriptor of the function

entityId.description: the entity reference at a call site, this, return or arg, this is the value to be tracked

entityIdIndex.description: the index of an argument, only to be used if the value of entityRef is arg, otherwise should be set to -1. argument indexing starts with 0.

entityName.description: information at the callsite used as name

entityNameIndex.description: the index of an argument, only to be used if the value of entityRef is arg, otherwise should be set to -1. argument indexing starts with 0.
